title: Personal Interview
content: What kind of questions can be expected during the personal interview for the BCA program?

comments.body: I have the same question , if you get any information let me know too , hahaha
Most people have said that they didn’t have to take an interview
Thats for btech , what about BCA?
I haven’t heard from anyone whose opted for BCA
Its understandable because they are starting BCA this year.
Other colleges usually ask just personal stuff like your future plans etc. Nothing course related .
Yo did u take that interview? I've taken bca and my interview is tmrw lol
